defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_NOProcessing0Has
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOProcessing0_G
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_NOProcessing0HasGreater
				check_variable = { 
					which = khx
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOProcessing0_R
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_NOProcessing0HasGreater
					check_variable = { 
						which = khx
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_NOProcessing0LowerAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOProcessing0LowerAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 25
				dip_power = 25
				mil_power = 50
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 65
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOProcessing0LowerAllow_N
		trigger = { 
			NOT = {

	}
}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_NOProcessing1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOProcessing1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				mil_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 30
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = bba
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOProcessing1RaiseAllow_N
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					mil_power = 50
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_NO
							influence = 30
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = bba
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_NOGame2Has
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = khy
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_NOGame0LowerAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOGame0LowerAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 25
				dip_power = 25
				mil_power = 50
				NOT = {

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_NOGame1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOGame1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				mil_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 30
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = bba
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOGame1RaiseAllow_N
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					mil_power = 50
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes

								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_NO
							influence = 30
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = bba
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = Privilege_NOSeigneurialRaise_title
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOSeigneurial1Raise_title
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_NOSeigneurial0Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = kia
					value = 0
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				mil_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO

						which = bba
						value = 2

						tooltip = Privilege_BUCourts2HasGreater

							value = 2

	name = Privilege_NOHeritableRaise_title
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOHeritable1Raise_title
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_NOHeritable0Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = kib
					value = 0
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				mil_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOHeritable1Raise_title_g
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_NOHeritable0Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = kib
					value = 0
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					mil_power = 50
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_NO
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_NOTitles0LowerAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOTitles0LowerAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 25
				dip_power = 25
				mil_power = 50
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 65
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOTitles0LowerAllow_N

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_NOTitles1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOTitles1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				mil_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_NOTitles1RaiseAllow_N
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					mil_power = 50
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
							}
						}

							faction = FC_NO
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		localisation_key = Privilege_NOTaxE1Raise_title
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_NOTaxE0Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = lqy
					value = 0
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				mil_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = NO_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_NO
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_BGTitles3Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = avc
					value = 3
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					dip_power = 50
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BG
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}
	}

		localisation_key = Privilege_BGCommerce3Raise_title
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_BGCommerce2Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = kih
					value = 2
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				dip_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_M

						}
					}

						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}

		localisation_key = Privilege_BGAutonomy4RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				dip_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = BG_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BG
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_BGAutonomy4RaiseAllow_N
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					dip_power = 50
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes

	name = Privilege_CLImmunity1NotHas
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLImmunity1_G
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_CLImmunity1HasGreater

						which = kim

				}

	name = Privilege_CLImmunity0LowerAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLImmunity0LowerAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 50
				dip_power = 25
				mil_power = 25
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_CL
						influence = 50
					}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_CLImmunity1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLImmunity1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_L
						}
					}

							influence = 50
						}
					}
				}
			}

	}

			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					adm_power = 50
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_CL
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLBlasphemy2Raise_title
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_CLBlasphemy1Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = kip
					value = 1
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 50
				OR = {

							ai = yes

					}

		}

	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLAppointments2_G
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_CLAppointments2HasGreater
					check_variable = { 
						which = kir
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLAppointments2_R
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_CLAppointments2HasGreater
				check_variable = { 
					which = kir
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				tooltip = Privilege_CLAppointments0Has

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_CLAppointments0LowerAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLAppointments0LowerAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 50
				dip_power = 25
				mil_power = 25
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_CL
						influence = 50
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLAppointments0LowerAllow_N
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					adm_power = 50
					dip_power = 25
					mil_power = 25
					NOT = { 
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_CL
							influence = 50
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_CLAppointments1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLAppointments1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_CL
						influence = 30
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLAppointments1RaiseAllow_N
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					adm_power = 50
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = CL_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_CL
							influence = 30
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_CLAppointmentsLower_title
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLAppointments0Lower_title
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_CLAppointments1Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = kir
					value = 1
				}
			}

				adm_power = 50
				dip_power = 25

	name = Privilege_CLTaxE0_title
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLTaxE0_g
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_CLTaxE0Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = now
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_CLTaxE0LowerAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_CLTaxE0LowerAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 50
				dip_power = 25
				mil_power = 25
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_CL
						influence = 50
					}
				}
			}
		}

	name = Privilege_CLTaxE1RaiseAllow
	text = {

		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				adm_power = 50
				OR = { 
					AND = {

								}
							}
						}
					}

					mil_power = 50
				}
			}
		}

		localisation_key = Privilege_BUOffice2Raise_title
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_BUOffice1Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = noh
					value = 1
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L

						ai = yes

							faction = FC_BU

							which = ati
							value = 10

								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S

	name = Privilege_BUTenure1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_BUTenure1RaiseAllow_Y

			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M

									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L

									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M

									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
								}

									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M

								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
							}
							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
							}
						}
					}
				}
				adm_power = 200
				dip_power = 100
				mil_power = 100
				check_variable = { 
					which = ati
					value = 80
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_BUHierarchy2Raise_title_g
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_BUHierarchy1Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = nol
					value = 1
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								ai = yes
								has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
								has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
								has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
							}
						}
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 40
						}
						AND = { 
							ai = yes
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 20
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = ati
								value = 10
							}
							AND = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
								}
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M

									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M

			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_BUHire4Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = nom
					value = 4
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BU
						influence = 50
					}
				}
				adm_power = 50
				dip_power = 25
				mil_power = 25
			}
		}
	}
	text = {

									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
								}
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
								}
							}
						}
					}
					adm_power = 150
					dip_power = 150
					mil_power = 100
					check_variable = { 
						which = ati
						value = 80
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

								which = ati
								value = 10
							}
							AND = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
								}
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
								}
							}
						}
					}
					adm_power = 250
					dip_power = 150
					mil_power = 50
					check_variable = { 
						which = ati
						value = 50
					}
					custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
						tooltip = Privilege_BUHire1HasGreater
						check_variable = { 
							which = nom
							value = 1
						}
					}
					custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
						tooltip = Privilege_BUHierarchy1HasGreater
						check_variable = { 
							which = nol
							value = 1
						}
					}
					capital_scope = { 
						OR = { 
							has_province_modifier = LN_Important
							has_province_modifier = LN_Major
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = gcl
							value = 1
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						has_institution = Meritocracy
						AND = { 
							capital_scope = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = gcl
									value = 3
								}
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = bcn
								value = 60
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_BUEnlist1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_BUEnlist1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BU
						influence = 20
					}
					AND = { 
						ai = yes
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 1
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 10
						}
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
							}
							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
							}
						}
					}
				}
				adm_power = 100
				dip_power = 150
				check_variable = { 
					which = ati
					value = 20
				}
			}
		}
	}

							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 20
						}
						AND = { 
							ai = yes
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 1
							}
							check_variable = { 
								which = ati
								value = 10
							}
							AND = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
								}
								NOT = { 
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M

									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M

							}

					}

					}
				}
			}

		localisation_key = Privilege_BUStructure1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BU
						influence = 10
					}
					AND = { 
						ai = yes
						faction_influence = { 
							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 1
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 10
						}
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
							}
							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
							}
						}
					}
				}
				adm_power = 150
				dip_power = 150
				mil_power = 150
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 5
						}
						NOT = { 
							average_home_autonomy = 75
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						ai = yes
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 5
						}
						NOT = { 
							average_home_autonomy = 85
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 30
						}
						NOT = { 
							average_home_autonomy = 80
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						ai = yes
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 30
						}
						NOT = { 
							average_home_autonomy = 90
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

defined_text = { 
	name = Privilege_BUStructureLower_title
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_BUStructure0Lower_title
		trigger = { 
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
				tooltip = Privilege_BUStructure1Has
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = noq
					value = 1
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BU
						influence = 50
					}
				}
				adm_power = 50
				dip_power = 50
				mil_power = 50
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = bba
						value = 2
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = bbc
						value = 1
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = bbg
						value = 0
					}
				}
				check_variable = { 
					which = bbk
					value = 0
				}
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = bby
						value = 1
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = bca
						value = 1

									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Crackdown_L
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_S
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
									has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
								}
							}
						}
					}
					check_variable = { 
						which = ati
						value = 80
					}
					adm_power = 200
					dip_power = 200
					mil_power = 150
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = Privilege_BUCourts1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_BUCourts1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							ai = yes
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
							has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
						}
					}
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BU
						influence = 20
					}
					AND = { 
						ai = yes

							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 1
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = ati
							value = 10
						}

							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S

								has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L

								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M

						tooltip = Privilege_NOSeigneurial2HasGreater
						check_variable = { 
							which = kia
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				OR = { 
					NOT = { 
						average_home_autonomy = 80
					}
					AND = { 
						ai = yes
						NOT = { 
							average_home_autonomy = 85
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}

					which = ati
					value = 30

					}

						}

	name = Privilege_BUPolitics1RaiseAllow
	text = { 
		localisation_key = Privilege_BUPolitics1RaiseAllow_Y
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					faction_influence = { 
						faction = FC_BU
						influence = 30
					}

						ai = yes

							faction = FC_BU
							influence = 10
						}

							which = ati
							value = 10
						}

							NOT = { 
								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S

								has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L

								has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_L

								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_M
								has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Crackdown_L
							}
						}
					}
				}
				adm_power = 100
				dip_power = 200
				mil_power = 100
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUHierarchy1HasGreater
